info.title: ConfidentialLedgerCertificateClient
info.description: The ConfidentialLedgerCertificateClient is used to retrieve the TLS certificate required for connecting to a Confidential Ledger.

parameters.name: certificateEndpoint
parameters.description: The certificate endpoint (or "Identity Service Endpoint" in the Azure portal), for example https://identity.confidential-ledger.core.azure.com

get.summary: Gets identity information for a Confidential Ledger instance.

parameters.name: ledgerId
parameters.description: Id of the Confidential Ledger instance to get information for

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

LedgerIdentityInformation.description: Contains the information about a Confidential Ledger.

ledgerTlsCertificate.description: PEM-encoded certificate used for TLS by the Confidential Ledger.
